title: Question to Riot about the new rune system coming to preseason
body: If a riot employee could answer this that would be nice with the new rune system how im pretty sure it was stated that the runes with be free now. If that is the case will there be a compensation for people who bought the runes we have now cause i have spent probably around 100k ip on runes and i feel now its just going to waste now

replies.body: As can be seen on the "[runes reforged](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/coming-preseason-runes-reforged)" discussion, they are still working on a plan for this. They will update the masses once they come to a decision themselves :)

It's gonna get runed

They gonna rune it for you
